snippet: The Nets’ new backup center, Andray Blatche, once tantalized Wizards coaches with his talent while disappointing them with his poor work ethic and off-court antics.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets backup center Andray Blatche, who disappointed the Washington Wizards with his poor work ethic and off-court antics, is working hard to prove that he can fit into the Nets' system.
lead_paragraph: The Nets’ new backup center, Andray Blatche, once tantalized Wizards coaches with his talent while disappointing them with his poor work ethic and off-court antics.

headline.seo: Nets’ Blatche Accompanied by Talent and Trouble
headline.main: Talent and Trouble Shadow Nets’ Blatche
headline.print_headline: Talent and Trouble Shadow Nets’ Blatche
